data.text: @Bethnalboi64 Hola Beth, our condolences for your loss. In order to ask for a proof that you didn't board, please use the following form and select the option ''proof request'' and then ''proof of no travel'' https://t.co/qlaQPQxXaG

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text:
@rpinedoojeda Hola Rowler, nos gustaría tener más información sobre el incidente. ¿Iniciaste una reclamación en el aeropuerto?, ¿tienes un código PIR asociado?. Déjanos saber todos los detalles por DM para revisar. Saludos.
https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@noskatesnodates Hola, we've just replied your DM. Best regards
@PilarArandaP payment. For this reason, the booking was cancelled due to the lack of payment. Best regards

@PilarArandaP Sorry, Pilar. The purchase is only confirmed when the payment has been processed and the ticket issued. In your case, as we can see, the payment should have been completed before august 27 at 3h59, but you never contacted our colleagues to finalize the /1
@GeorgeForth You're welcome 😀

@GeorgeForth Hola George, on the following link, under the ''bulky or heavy luggage'' option, you find more details about travelling with large boxes: https://t.co/FZ3dvA5TTn . We remain at your disposal

urls.title: Special baggage - Iberia
urls.description: Special baggage means baggage items with specific characteristics that are allowed to be carried on board the plane: skiing equipment, bicycles, musical instruments...

data.text: @jewllee Hola, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Could you please send us a DM with your full name and the PIR reference number? https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Swiftyll Hola Luke, sorry for the delay. We've just replied your DM. Please check
@youssef_b113 Hola Youssef, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM. Regards
@PilarArandaP We are sorry to read this Maria, we have replied all details by DM. Regards

@mimi_simhon Hola Mimi, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM all details of your bag claim, including your PIR code, full passenger name and an screenshot of the Baggage claim document? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @Pat_Fling Hola Pat, we inform you that if you flew with us and a previously purchased seat was not assigned (or one with similar characteristics) you can initiate a claim through our web form:  1/

@rudimuss Hola Rudimuss, we are sorry to read your comments. Let us know by DM if there is anything we can assist you with from this department. Kind regards.
https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@PilarArandaP Maria, we are sorry that we cannot tell you anything different from what we have indicated in previous messages. Let us know by DM if there is anything else we can help you with from this department. Regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Dlmeunier Hola Dara, we have requested additional information by DM to review and help you from this department. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@kevkader Hola Kevin, we are sorry to read your comments. We confirm that we have responded to your direct messages telling you how to proceed. Let us know in case of any doubt. Regards.
https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@PilarArandaP Hola Pilar, we have responded to your direct messages. Let us know in case of any doubt. Regards.
https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@Jump4imog Hola, did you purchase your ticket through our website? Please send us a DM with the details of your booking so we can have a look. Kind regards.  https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@EnjoyingItMore Hola, we have replied to your DMs. Kind regards.
@ralphie440DOM Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. We'll contact the claims department and get back to you as soon as we have an update. Kind regards

@MrsProulx Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. When flying economy, the meal service is only included in our medium and long-haul flights (more than 4h30). Here you can find more details https://t.co/2trIDBsZzt

data.text: @soffavaloro Hola, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your full name and the PIR reference number https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@EnjoyingItMore Hola, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your full name, booking reference code and ticket number https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@cerwin2day Hola, we're sorry to read this. Could you ask the passenger to contact us directly here on Twitter or on https://t.co/mY4B1tChDF ? We can only share info with him. If he is a minor, please send us his full name and PIR reference via DM https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

data.text: @johnmlhll Have a great flight, John! 😀
@Gingersuzie Thank you, we will answer there :).
@Gingersuzie Hola Suzie, is your frequent flyer number is linked to your booking? could you send us a DM with all the information please? Thank you.

@Robert_ravel_ Hola Roberto, para poder ayudarte desde este canal es necesario que nos envíes un MD (https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6) con tu número de reclamación (P*******-*******) y así poder verificar. Quedamos a tu disposición y atentos de la información. Saludos.
@tvrtastic Hola Robert, Please send us the file or dossier number to be able to give you the status. Thank you.
@1010kent Hola Ken, do you have a PIR? Is that belongs to us? Send us a DM with the details. We remain at your disposal.
@JackTheTOY Hola Jack, have you sent your request already? Please fill our form at: https://t.co/qlaQPQxXaG. Regards.

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @jdhspkwa Hola Julie, could you send us your PIR number, a description of your luggage, a list of content, the temporary and permanent address, your email address, your booking code and complete name by DM please? Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@turbanized Hola, we are sorry to hear this, please check your DMs. Regards.
@nicoledssx Hola, Nicole. Sentimos leer tu comentario. ¿Has abierto reclamación en la web? Si podemos ayudarte por aquí, quedamos a tu disposición. Un saludo https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@anitasriquelme Hola Anita, sentimos leer esto, ¿podrías enviarnos por DM los datos de tu caso o reclamo? Muchas gracias.

@mlbastidas Hola María. ¿Nos podrías confirmar eres el titular de la incidencia con el equipaje? Si no es así, podrías por favor indicarle al titular que contacte con nosotros para poder revisar. Quedamos atentos. Saludos.
@Shannon56598479 Hola, we have sent you response again in our conversation by DM. Kind regards.
@Aland85623013 Hola, we answered your DM requesting more details to be able to follow up on your case from here. Kind regards.

@kevkader Hola Kevin. Sentimos los inconvenientes con tu equipaje, nuestros compañeros estan trabajando para localizar tu equipaje lo más pronto posible. Deberás poder recibir alguna actualización a tu correo electrónico o SMS. Agradecemos tu paciencia. Un saludo.
@indierocknerd Hola, we have sent you a reply in our conversation by direct message. Kind regards.

@indierocknerd Hola Indierocknerd. Could you please provide us  the details via direct message  https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa so we'd be able to consult from here? We remain at your disposal. 
Kind Regards
@mikebarnett58 Hola Mike, we operate direct flights from/to London Heathrow, London Gatwick and Manchester airport. Here you can check the flight options: https://t.co/m6fyDz8alC

data.text: @noelxmas50 Sorry to read this. Please ask the passenger to contact us directly, as we can only share information with the person who opened the PIR at the airport with the airline that operated the last flight on the itinerary. Kind regards
@lucyt126 Hola Lucy, hemos respondido a tu DM, continuaremos la comunicación por ese medio, saludos.
@johncalia Hola John, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your Iberia booking code and the reference number (07555...) related to the upgrade payment https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@ragg88cl Hemos respondido a tu DM, continuaremos la comunicación por ese medio, saludos.
@lucymalcolm Hola Lucy, sorry for the delay. We've just replied it
@perfctlygeorge Thanks :)
@rb2676 Hola Cave, we sent you a DM. Regards.
@tag_from Hola, could you send us the details by DM? Do you have a lost item and you didn't get on time to your second fly? Could you clarify this? Thank you.
@JoanaROpereira Hola Joana, we sent you a DM. Regards.
@AmandaM90946822 Hola Amanda, vamos contatar o departamento responsável uma vez mais e retornaremos assim que tivermos resposta. Atenciosamente
@pedagopractice Hola Alissa, please send us the PIR code, your complete name and your full contact details by DM. Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@Seblechanoine Hola Sebastien, could you send us the details by DM, we will help you from here. Regards.
@caryonbaggage Hola Cary, we just replied to your MD, Regards
@alisichka Hola Alyssa, is there something we can assist you with? let us know more details. Regards
@johncalia Hola John, please contact us in a DM. Regards
@kevkader Hola, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM. We'll continue through that channel. Regards
@ArielMWarren Hola Ariel, the area in charge will contact you directly by email once the claim case has been reviewed. Regards

@johncalia Hola John is necessary to fill out the form this way a file can be created. You can try to add the codes as we mention and in the claim text provide the real booking code and ticket. Regards
@johncalia Hola, please do not enter the ticket number with spaces or -/ if there is any issue add the ticket as:  075XXXXXXXXXX and the booking code as  XXXXXX. Regards
@stephaniemthoma Hola Stephanie. We have answered to your DM requesting more details about your request. Regards
@LonniBouchek Hola Lonni. Could you provide us with details about your inquiry through DM? Regards
@johncalia We have answered to your previous tweet, John. Regards

data.text:
@Angie89859709 We're sorry to read this, Angie. Did you open a claim at the airport to report you missing luggage?
Regards

@perfctlygeorge Hola Mimi. Sure! Could you please DM us with the details about your inquiry?
Regards
@noelxmas50 Hola Christine. We're sorry to read this. We understand you already took the flight, is that correct? Please let us know. Regards
@Bethnalboi64 Hola. We have answered to your DM requesting details so that we're able to process your request. Regards
@peaceleys Hola. We have answered to your DM requesting details about your case. Regards
@m1ssyoung We have answered to your private message, Caroline.
@daskomp We have answered to your private message about your case, Alex. Regards
@DanielRey93 Hola Daniel, we have answered to your query by private means. For the moment we are waiting for the response of our colleagues in the area in charge. Regards
@ragg88cl Gracias Ricardo, continuamos la conversación por ese medio. Saludos.

@ragg88cl Hola, para revisar tu caso y ayudarte desde este departamento, por favor envíanos un mensaje directo con tu nombre completo, código de reserva y número de expediente asociado a la reclamación que nos mencionas. Quedamos a la espera de la información. 
https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@VinodJa83744744 Hola, please send us in a DM with the details of your query and your booking code to check the available options. Kind Regards.

https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@1RealDCNative Hola, Send us a DM with as much info as possible, please remember to include your reference number and full contact details. Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@katefroehlich46 Hello Kate, we can see that you called us, our colleagues gave you the information. We appreciate your patience. Regards.
@lexi_hsr Hols, Send us a DM with as much info as possible, please remember to include your reference number and full contact details. Thank you.
@Bethnalboi64 Hola, how we can help you? Could you send us a DM? Thank you.
@josefa1000 Hola, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@CampbellGillies Hola Victoria, could you reply to our DM? Thank you.
@felix10501254 Hola Felix, sentimos lo ocurrido, hemos pedido revisión interna de tu caso, cualquier novedad te decimos. Saludos
@BachirAkhdar HOla Bachir, thank you for contacting u, could you please give us your booking code, ticket numbeer and registered email to verify th einformation. Regards

@BackupBluesBBQ Hola Charles, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM all details of your situation including your booking code, ticket number and registered email? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Lim05726594 Hola LIm, thank you for contacting us, could you please give us by DM all details to verify the information? Thanks in advnace https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@michelleaboden Hola Michelle, we have replied your DM with all details. Regards

@59Liberal Hola, te confirmamos que hemos respondido tus mensajes directos indicándote cómo proceder. Déjanos saber por ese medio en caso de cualquier duda. Saludos.
https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@1981hdlst Hola, thank you for contacting us. We proceed to review your direct messages. Kind regards.

@brunitou Hola Bruno, nos gustaría tener más información sobre el incidente. Por favor envíanos un MD con todos los detalles para revisar e indicarte cómo proceder. Un saludo  
https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@Nataliemlue Hola Natalie. Have you opened an irregularity (PIR) at the airport? Could you please provide us  the details via direct message  https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa so we'd be able to consult from here? We remain at your disposal. 
Kind Regards
@darlenelcohn this way you will be informed of all the news and if your flight is affected, you'd be able to see your possible alternatives and options at your disposal. Kind regards,

@darlenelcohn Hello Darlene. You can check our flight latest news through the following link https://t.co/hvoqytUSDD  . If you have a booking purchased through https://t.co/wCD0fEwHFh, we suggest you to sign up at Iberia Conecta, https://t.co/H2tdxpiZ8M  /1
